name: Somble
description:
Fight elementals on your way back to bed, combining their essences into powerful potions. Use them together to maximize their effectiveness.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move.

Left click to kick the essence out of elementals.

Right click to brew a potion, which will be thrown towards your mouse cursor.

This game is open source, available under the MIT License, or the Apache License, Version 2.0, at your option. https://github.com/CatThingy/somble/
